sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"相似的，类似的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: alike, like, similar, comparable, parallel, uniform, identical
means: alike ：指事物在性质、特征或外貌上固有的而不是偶然的相似。普通用词，只作表语。
like ：普通用词，含义广泛，指多个或全部特性都相似，但并非同一个，也可指在某个特殊的偶然相似。
similar ：强调不同的人或事物之间完全或部分相似，暗示可暂不考虑或无视其差异之处。
comparable ：指在某一点或几点上有相似之处，可作有限或粗略的对比，尤指在价值或能力等方面可相提并论。
parallel ：主要指在外表或在性质上相似到有可以相提并论的程度。
uniform ：指在性质、数量、形态或程度等方面相似到很难看出差异的地步。
identical ：语气最强，可指同一个人或物，也可指数个人或物之间完全没有差别。

word_mean: 平行的：有关互不交叉的直线或平面的
并联的：有关并排联接的电路元件的
这种联接可使电流分流到通过一个元件的各个分路，然后再汇合到一起
该词又扩大应用到任何类似的平行线路或管路，例如通到各个器官的体循环

sentence.Network_en: Parallel lines will never meet no matter how far extended.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论延伸多长，平行线永不相交。

sentence.Network_en: Farthing Lane's just above the High Street and parallel with it.
sentence.Network_cn: 法辛巷刚好在大街的北面，与大街平行。

sentence.Network_en: Do the emotions develop in parallel with the intellect?
sentence.Network_cn: 情感与智力是并行发展的吗？

PerfectNetExp.abs: 数学英语词汇大全_百度文库 ... 射线 radial 平行 parallel 相交 intersect.
并行（parallel）：是说将一件事情分成很多小部分，让每一部分同时执行，最后将执行结果汇总成最终结果。 可以把Latch 理解为一 …
690个英语四级高频词汇 ... conservative a. 保守的 456. parallel n. 平行线；可相比拟的事物 457. passion n. 激情，热情 458.
21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(一) - 豆丁网 ... apart ad. 成碎片 parallel a. 平行的，并列的 switch vi. 改变，转移.

list.abs: 排比（parallelism）是很常见的修辞手法，那就是把几个结构相同，字数相近的词组并排写出。排比句往往结构工整，节奏明显，朗读 …
汽车英语词汇 - 老梦的日志 - 网易博客 ... 不平行度 wedge 平行度 parallelism 透光率 light transmittance.

jx.jx_en_mean: occurring at the same time and having some connection
jx.jx_cn_mean: 并列的；相关的且同时发生的

means.word_mean: 比...相应,比得过,配得上;模仿,仿制,相像,比较
平行线,平行面,平行四边形,平行六面体
相同的,类似的,一致的,同源的,同族的

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French parallèle, via Latin from Greek parallēlos, from para- 'alongside' + allēlos 'one another'

entry.tran: （存在或发生在不同地点或时间的）相似之物，类似物
entry.def: If something has a parallel, it is similar to something else, but exists or happens in a different place or at a different time. If it has no parallel or is without parallel, it is not similar to anything else.

example.ex: Readers familiar with English history will find a vague parallel to the suppression of the monasteries...
example.tran: 熟悉英国历史的读者会发现这与镇压修道院略有相似之处。

example.ex: It's an ecological disaster with no parallel anywhere else in the world.
example.tran: 这是一场在世界其他地方都没有出现过的生态灾难。

entry.tran: （两者间的）近似之处，相似之处
entry.def: If there are parallels between two things, they are similar in some ways.

example.ex: Detailed study of folk music from a variety of countries reveals many close parallels...
example.tran: 仔细研究各国民间音乐后发现了许多非常相似之处。

example.ex: There are significant parallels with the 1980s...
example.tran: 与20世纪80年代有明显相似之处。

entry.def: If one thing parallels another, they happen at the same time or are similar, and often seem to be connected.

example.ex: Often there are emotional reasons paralleling the financial ones...
example.tran: 往往情感方面的原因和经济方面原因同时存在。

example.ex: The change in smoking is paralleled by a change in the incidence of lung cancer...
example.tran: 吸烟情况的变化与肺癌发病率的变化如影随形。

entry.def: Parallel events or situations happen at the same time as one another, or are similar to one another.

example.ex: ...parallel talks between the two countries' Foreign Ministers...
example.tran: 两国外交部长同时进行的会谈

example.ex: Their instincts do not always run parallel with ours...
example.tran: 他们的本能并不总是和我们的相同。

entry.def: If two lines, two objects, or two lines of movement are parallel, they are the same distance apart along their whole length.

example.ex: ...seventy-two ships, drawn up in two parallel lines...
Farthing Lane's just above the High Street and parallel with it...
example.tran: 法辛巷刚好在大街的北面，与大街平行。

entry.def: A parallel is an imaginary line round the earth that is parallel to the equator. Parallels are shown on maps.
Something that occurs in parallel with something else occurs at the same time as it.

example.ex: Davies has managed to pursue his diverse interests in parallel with his fast-moving career...
example.tran: 戴维斯在事业突飞猛进的同时并未放弃自己广泛的兴趣爱好。

example.ex: Progress on this issue must be made in parallel to any moves on the economic front.
example.tran: 这个问题上的进展应该和经济领域的进展同步。

means.word_mean: 1. something having the property of being analogous to something else
2. an imaginary line around the Earth parallel to the equator
2. make or place parallel to something;

sentences.sentence: "They paralleled the ditch to the highway"
"The polished surface twinned his face and chest in reverse"

means.word_mean: 1. being everywhere equidistant and not intersecting;
2. of or relating to the simultaneous performance of multiple operations;

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps the dark matter is in a parallel universe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps the dark matter is in a parallel universe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps the dark matter is in a parallel universe.

auth_sentence.content: You see a parallel spirit in the restaurant community.
auth_sentence.res_content: You see a parallel spirit in the restaurant community.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You see a parallel spirit in the restaurant community.

auth_sentence.content: In contrast, the bottom-up approach is massively parallel.
auth_sentence.res_content: In contrast, the bottom-up approach is massively parallel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In contrast, the bottom-up approach is massively parallel.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"半,类似,辅助"; 2. 表示"降落伞"; 3. 表示"在旁边"

stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准军事性的,起军事辅助作用的
stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+military军事的→准军事的
para半,类似,辅助+political政治的→adj.半政治的
para半,类似,辅助+state国+al的→adj.半官方的
para在旁边+bol抛+ic的→adj.抛物线[状]的
para在旁边+noid=note注意→在旁边注意→怀疑的
para半,类似,辅助+legal法律的→辅助法律的
para半,类似,辅助+medic医师,实习医生→n.护理人员
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释
para降落伞+chut落下+e→n.降落伞
para降落伞+drop扔下→n.空投,空降

stems_affixes.value_cn: 伞兵部队, 空降部队
stems_affixes.word_buile: para降落伞+troop部队+s→n.伞兵部队, 空降部队
para在旁边+digm显示→在旁边显示给[别人]→示范
para在旁边+dox观点→观点边上有观点→矛盾
para在旁边+gon角→旁边顶尖人物→典范
para在旁边+log说话逻辑+ism现象,状态→在逻辑边上→不是逻辑
para旁边+sit坐+e→坐在在旁边[吃]→吃白食→寄生虫,食客
para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使瘫痪[麻痹];使丧失作用
stems_affixes.word_buile: para在旁边+lyze分开→旁边分开→瘫痪

Sentence.sentence: If he keeps the palm of the hand parallel to the floor, as he would in his own culture when making known the height of a child, for example, he will very likely be greeted by laughter, in Colombia this gesture is reserved for the description of animals.
The damage to American craftsmanship seems to parallel the steep slide in manufacturing employment.

sentences.en: This is the parallel points in the characters of different men.
sentences.cn: 这就是不同人物间个性上的类似之处。

sentences.en: The growth of the two towns was almost parallel.
sentences.cn: 这两个城镇的发展几乎相同。

sentences.en: This line is a parallel with that one.
There are some interesting parallels between the educational systems of these two countries.
sentences.cn: 这两国的教育制度之间有些有趣的相似之处。

sentences.en: This city is close to the fortieth parallel of north latitude.
No one has paralleled his successful business.
sentences.cn: 没有人赶得上他在事业上的成就。

jushi.english: This is the parallel points in the characters of different men.
jushi.chinese: 这就是不同人物间个性上的类似之处。

jushi.english: The growth of the two towns was almost parallel.
jushi.chinese: 这两个城镇的发展几乎相同。
